flawed_nl_solution:
There are 30 games total because 20 + 10 = <<20+10=30>>30
They need to win 45 games because 30 x (2/3) = <<30*(2/3)=45>>45
The need to win 33 more games because 45 - 12 = <<45-12=33>>33

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 45. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
